properties.areaDesc: S of Cape Lookout NC to Surf City NC out to 20 nm; S of Ocracoke Inlet NC to Cape Lookout NC out to 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 19 at 11:03AM EST until January 20 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 30 kt, becoming
northwest and seas 5 to 9 ft.

* WHERE...The coastal waters from Cape Lookout to Surf City.

* WHEN...Until 11 AM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM EST MONDAY... ...GALE WARNING HAS EXPIRED
